name: Zeta Strike
description:
Zeta Strike is an arcade twin stick shooter made for Ludum Dare 31 by New Light Gaming. Set in an apocalyptic, abandoned world, survive as many waves of enemies as possible before being overwhelmed. Gather new weapons, increase your health and armour, and see how long you would last during a Zeta Strike.

Play Online: http://www.kongregate.com/games/Farnsworth2/zeta-strike

v2: Re-uploaded to fix menu graphics glitch.

v3: Fixes several animation pop in errors.

v4: Fixes enemies pointing wrong direction, adds Linux support, and adds Mac support.
